_comment_ouputs: For output video stream, define ratios supported then possible width and finally the max height supported
_comment_vignettesOutput: For vignettes (in Mosaic or in Overlay), define ratios supported then possible width and finally the max height supported
_comment_botVideoCompositor: Login / password to use for the Video Compositor
_comment_botManagers: Just login can be set here BUT ONLY if the bot manager has been added in the roster of the bot orchestrator. If not login+jid must be set
